home.title: Welcome to {{app}}
home.subtitle: This is a fresh start. We’ll grow the experience together as we add offline data, sync, and more polished visuals.

landing.title: Build habits that stick with {{app}}
landing.subtitle: Track progress, stay consistent, and get gentle nudges when it matters.

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.resetSubtitle: Enter your email to get a reset link.

reset.missingEmailDescription: We need it to send a reset link.
reset.successDescription: Check your email for instructions to reset your password.

signup.missingDescription: Enter a valid email and password.
signup.passwordMismatchDescription: Make sure both password fields match.
signup.checkEmailDescription: Confirm your email to finish creating your account.

offline.title: Check your connection
offline.description: We could not reach the server. Please verify your connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request timed out
timeout.description: The server took too long to respond. Please try again.

constraint.title: Already saved
constraint.description: Looks like this entry already exists. Try renaming it or editing the original.

storageFull.title: Device storage is full
storageFull.description: Free up space on your device, then try the action again.

busy.title: Database is busy
busy.description: Please wait a moment and try again.

invalidCredentials.title: Invalid email or password
invalidCredentials.description: Double-check your credentials and try again.

rateLimit.title: Too many attempts
rateLimit.description: Please wait a moment before trying again.

oauthBrowser.title: OAuth unavailable
oauthBrowser.description: Sign in with email and password instead.

permission.title: Notifications unavailable
permission.description: We could not reach the notification service. Check your connection or retry later.

appUpdate.title: Update required
appUpdate.description: A newer version is required to continue. Please update the app to keep using it.
appUpdate.promptDescription: A new version is ready. Update now for the best experience.

settings.syncUnavailableWeb: Background sync requires the iOS or Android app to access the local database.
settings.syncUnavailableAuth: Sign in to enable syncing with your Supabase account.
settings.accountSignInDescription: Sign in to sync your data across devices.
settings.profileDescription: Update the name and email linked to your account.
settings.namePromptDescription: Tell us what to call you. You can change this later.
settings.profileEmailHelper: Changing your email may require verification.
settings.profileEmailManaged: Email is managed by your sign-in provider.
settings.profileSignInRequired: Sign in to edit your profile.
settings.resetDescription: Delete all local and synced data and start fresh.
settings.resetConfirmDescription: This deletes all local data, reminders, and synced data. This cannot be undone. Also, you will be signed out.
settings.resetSuccessLocal: Local data reset. Remote data will be cleared after you sign in.
settings.resetRequiresAuth: Sign in to reset synced data.
settings.themeDescription: Select a theme on this device.
settings.streakPreviewDescription: Quick look at upcoming streaks (placeholder until main UI lands).
settings.syncStorageDescription: Review local queue status and run a manual sync with Supabase.
settings.syncDisabled: Sign in on a native build to sync.
settings.remindersBlocked: Enable notifications in system settings to turn on reminders.
settings.pushDescription: Enable alerts for reminders, summaries, and updates.
settings.pushStatusDenied: Push notifications are blocked in system settings.
settings.pushStatusUnavailable: Push notifications are unavailable on this platform.
settings.pushStatusUnknown: Push notifications are not configured yet.
settings.pushAttemptsMax: You’ve reached the max number of prompts. Try later in Settings.
settings.pushCooldown: You recently declined. Try again later.
settings.pushNotSupportedDescription: Use the native app to enable push notifications.
settings.pushDeniedDescription: Enable notifications in system settings and try again.
settings.pushUnavailableDescription: This platform does not support push notifications.
settings.pushCooldownDescription: We’ve paused prompts to avoid spamming you.
settings.pushErrorDescription: Unable to enable push notifications right now.
settings.webNotificationsUnsupportedTitle: Notifications available on desktop and mobile app
settings.webNotificationsUnsupportedDescription: Push notifications are disabled on mobile web and PWA. Use the iOS/Android app or a desktop browser.
settings.pushStatusMobileWebDisabled: Push notifications are disabled on mobile web.
settings.getHelpDescription: We'd love to hear from you! Share your feedback or report any issues you've encountered.
settings.getHelpBugDescription: Found something that's not working? Let us know so we can fix it.
settings.getHelpFeedbackDescription: Share your thoughts, suggestions, or ideas for improvement.
settings.getHelpMessageHint: Your email client will open with a pre-filled message. Feel free to add more details before sending.
settings.remotePushDescription: Cloud-delivered push for reminders, summaries, and updates.
settings.archiveBeforeTodayHelper: Archive entries dated prior to today.
settings.upcomingFeatures: Additional settings will arrive alongside theme controls and data export.

notifications.softPromptMessage: Stay on track. Enable notifications to get reminders and updates for your habits.
